detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Xtime (contractSource/TSE/0x13ce614e9d7ce609dedba1b42ba2163426ba5ace.sol#69-89) has payable functions:
	 - Xtime.fallback() (contractSource/TSE/0x13ce614e9d7ce609dedba1b42ba2163426ba5ace.sol#85-87)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
